entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow changing to light snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
